RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 220 Y Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 5400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TF JESS DASHIN motored by them. DADDY SWEET PRINCESS bold bid, edged. ONE MORE PATRIOT off best, caught. CHIC LAICO BIRD mild threat. JESA VALIANT HERO no late kick. POOL ZONE hesitant start.

ENTRY.NAME: One More Patriot
ENTRY.OWNER: Cowan Mark C Saathoff Brian and Seifert Pat

ENTRY.NAME: Pool Zone
ENTRY.OWNER: Sanchez III Noe Rolando Chapa Adolfo and Camarillo Bulmaro

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 400 Y Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Purse 7000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROGUE FROM THE SOUTH drifted out, speedy. FLINT RIVER TRAIN long duel, denied. ITSACORONAYEAR brushed, floated in. JB TOO SEXY lacked room early. HEZ HUNTERS ROGUE forced to change lane. FLIRTY LOOKS spun wheels at start.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 300 Y Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 11700. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BT GOT GAME inched away from em. CORONA BLUES winner too tough. MP FLY HIGH in mix, no match. JJ KICJESS PRINCESS no excuses. JJ FREIGHT STAR brushed midway. IM THAT DOVE urged, empty.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 330 Y Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 7000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOUIE BLUES strong rally. SUMPNS UP never far from it. BV BIG BUX sharp, couldnt last. BJS FIVE BAR unable to match stride. GIVE ME THE DICE bored in, trailed.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 250 Y Dirt CR: 68. Maiden Purse 6000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FASTDASH THESE SILKS late surge for score. TF EYESA JESS JUMPN broke through gate, much improved. TF CLASSY LIL JESS much needed start. SUGAR TIME GIRL fired, faded. VESTA finished under restraint. FIVE STAR CHICK no rally. ADRENALANNE danced in gate.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 400 Y Dirt CR: 86. Optional Claiming Purse 8500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $20,000. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHEZ BEYOND FAST dueled, kicked clear. REACH THRU sharp start, outfinished. JM FRIDAY gaining at finish. TOASTA PATRIOT CHICK second flight duel. CHANGING THE GAME lacked a rally. NOKIDDN between, weakened.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 250 Y Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Claiming Purse 7000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HEZA SILENT ROGUE took off at once. IGOT SUMTING SPECIAL floated out, dueled on. JJ CORONAS FOREVER good late run. TG COUP ZOOMS in hunt, failed to sustain. BLUE LOUISINA FIRE floated in midway. WAR PATROIT bumped, lacked room. JRS MAJESTICS FIRST danced in gate, broke inward, crowded partway.

ENTRY.NAME: Jrs Majestics First
ENTRY.COMMENT: danced in gate, broke inward, crowded partway
